Sentencas: This work proposes an original method for tailoring the microstructure and electrical properties of Ni/GDC anodes by using 3D inkjet printing of high-viscosity functional compositions with intermediate laser treatment of each layer after each printing pass.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: Based on a mixture of highly dispersed oxides NiO and CeO2 doped with gadolinium (GDC), paste formulations for 3D inkjet printing have been developed.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: The effects of 3D printing and laser treatment conditions on the porosity and shrinkage ratio of the NiO/GDC anodes during sintering were investigated.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: The reduction of the anode support workpieces to produce Ni/GDC cermet was carried out and the effect of laser exposure on the morphology and electrical characteristics of the resulting samples was studied.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: It was found that an increase in the laser exposure values during layer-by-layer laser treatment of printing compositions leads to a two-fold increase in the porosity of the solid oxide fuel cell components, an increase in the average pore size from 0.2 to 0.3 to 2-5 mu m, and to a five-fold decrease in the sintering shrinkage ratio.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: It was also found that the electrical conductivity of the Ni/GDC cermet, produced by the reduction of the laser treated NiO/GDC, increased by 5-10 times as the laser exposure values increased.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: The influence mechanism of the layerby-layer laser treatment of the original NiO/GDC samples on the electrical conductivity of their reduced counterparts, Ni/GDC cermet anodes, has been proposed.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: An increase in the electrical conductivity was shown to be due to in situ reduction of NiO, partial sintering of Ni nanoparticles and the formation of a percolation network.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment

Sentencas: This new method of hybrid 3D printing opens up great prospects for tailoring the morphological and electrical characteristics of SOFC anode supports.
Titulo: A novel approach to tailoring the microstructure and electrophysical properties of Ni/GDC-based anodes by combining 3D-inkjet printing and layer-by-layer laser treatment
